summary: This is a stand-alone replacer follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/3UGnDTh.png[/img][/center][b][size=6]HI, everyone!![/size][/b]
First I am from Taiwan player. So my english is not very well, sorry![img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/ohdear.png[/img]
This is my first stand-alone replacer follower mod[i] [size=1]([/size][size=1]Only above the neck)[/size][/i]. So you don't need other mods to him like my image.
And I replacer is based on my game progress.

[b][size=5]Before busy with work, so I have no free time to play and replacer. Sorry![/size][/b][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/ohdear.png[/img]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61689-1-1421251266.png[/img]

Some player have CTD after use the mod, try the DXT5 face texture on optional files. Original texture is DXT3 (ARGB8).

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61689-1-1421262841.png[/img]

[b][size=6]Hope you like it...[/size][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/wink.gif[/img][/b]

[size=2]>> Use mod of replacer:[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?][size=3]RaceMenu[/size][size=1] by Expired[/size][/url]
Hair
[url=http://shockyy.tumblr.com/post/106418391954/ks-hairdos-400-the-hairpack-has-been-updated][size=3]KS Hairdos - 400[/size][size=1] by Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/size][/url]
Face
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?][size=3]Fine Face Textures for Men[/size][size=1] by urshi[/size][/url]
ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21123/?][size=3]The Wilds ENB[/size][size=1] by Lunanella[/size][/url]

>> And you use my mod but into the game is grey face, try this. The steps are easy, don't wory.[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/thumbsup.gif[/img]
YOUTUBE: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rOXF89QtgYM]Skyrim Creation kit (Custom NPC Grey Face mismatch texture bug FIX)[/url]


>> My other replacer mod, try it too.[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/dance.gif[/img]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57183/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/LmGwkH6.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57290/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/dtHsScd.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57354/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/zGHNfkE.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57587/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/dsL3ELv.png[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61835/?]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hhWvoJV.png[/img][/url][/center]






For Chinese-language[size=1](CHT/CHS)[/size] user:
[url=http://www.gamemale.com/?fromuid=61838]GameMale論壇[/url] 
這是一個專門討論男性遊戲討論論壇, 有興趣歡迎參觀. 我的MOD都在這論壇裡面也包括漢化.
author: kerwin1988
